00034 settings_t settings;
00035 
00036 // Version 1 outdated settings record
00037 typedef struct {
00038 //// 843 : 4 -> N_AXIS
00039   double steps_per_mm[N_AXIS];
00040   uint8_t microsteps;
00041   uint8_t pulse_microseconds;
00042   double default_feed_rate;
00043   double default_seek_rate;
00044   uint8_t invert_mask;
00045   double mm_per_arc_segment;
00046 } settings_v1_t;
00047 
00048 void settings_reset() {
00049   settings.steps_per_mm[X_AXIS] = DEFAULT_X_STEPS_PER_MM;
00050   settings.steps_per_mm[Y_AXIS] = DEFAULT_Y_STEPS_PER_MM;
00051   settings.steps_per_mm[Z_AXIS] = DEFAULT_Z_STEPS_PER_MM;
00052 /// 844 : axis T
00053 #if (AXIS_T_TYPE == LINEAR)
00054    settings.steps_per_mm[T_AXIS] = DEFAULT_T_STEPS_PER_MM;
00055 #else
00056    settings.steps_per_degree[T_AXIS] = DEFAULT_T_STEPS_PER_DEGREE;
00057 #endif
00058 
00059   settings.pulse_microseconds = DEFAULT_STEP_PULSE_MICROSECONDS;
00060   settings.default_feed_rate = DEFAULT_FEEDRATE;
00061   settings.default_seek_rate = DEFAULT_RAPID_FEEDRATE;
00062   settings.acceleration = DEFAULT_ACCELERATION;
00063   settings.mm_per_arc_segment = DEFAULT_MM_PER_ARC_SEGMENT;
00064   settings.invert_mask_stepdir = DEFAULT_STEPPING_INVERT_MASK;
00065   settings.invert_mask_limit = DEFAULT_LIMIT_INVERT_MASK;
00066   settings.junction_deviation = DEFAULT_JUNCTION_DEVIATION;
00067   settings.spindle_pwm = SPINDLE_PWM;
00068   settings.default_spindle = DEFAULT_SPINDLE_SPEED;
00069   settings.max_spindle = MAX_SPINDLE_SPEED;
00070 }
00071 
00072 void settings_dump() {
00073   printPgmString(PSTR("$VERSION = "));
00074   printPgmString(PSTR(GRBL_VERSION " " GRBL_AXIS));
00075   printPgmString(PSTR("\r\n"));
00076 
00077   printPgmString(PSTR("$0 = "));
00078   printFloat(settings.steps_per_mm[X_AXIS]);
00079   printPgmString(PSTR(" (steps/mm x)\r\n"));
00080 
00081   printPgmString(PSTR("$1 = "));
00082   printFloat(settings.steps_per_mm[Y_AXIS]);
00083   printPgmString(PSTR(" (steps/mm y)\r\n"));
00084 
00085   printPgmString(PSTR("$2 = "));
00086   printFloat(settings.steps_per_mm[Z_AXIS]);
00087   printPgmString(PSTR(" (steps/mm z)\r\n"));
00088 
00089 
00090 /// 845 : axis X, Y, Z, U, V, W
00091 /// axis U, V, W
00092 #if (AXIS_T_TYPE == LINEAR)
00093   printPgmString(PSTR("$3 = "));
00094   printFloat(settings.steps_per_mm[T_AXIS]);
00095 #if AXIS_T == AXIS_U
00096  printPgmString(PSTR(" (steps/mm u)\r\n"));
00097 #elif AXIS_T == AXIS_V
00098  printPgmString(PSTR(" (steps/mm v)\r\n"));
00099 #elif AXIS_T == AXIS_W
00100  printPgmString(PSTR(" (steps/mm w)\r\n"));
00101 #endif
00102 
00103 #else
00104 /// axis A, B, C
00105   printPgmString(PSTR("$3 = "));
00106   printFloat(settings.steps_per_degree[T_AXIS]);
00107 #if AXIS_T == AXIS_A
00108  printPgmString(PSTR(" (steps/deg. a)\r\n"));
00109 #elif AXIS_T == AXIS_B
00110  printPgmString(PSTR(" (steps/deg. b)\r\n"));
00111 #elif AXIS_T == AXIS_C
00112  printPgmString(PSTR(" (steps/deg. C)\r\n"));
00113 #endif
00114 
00115 #endif
00116 
00117   printPgmString(PSTR("$4 = "));
00118   printInteger(settings.pulse_microseconds);
00119   printPgmString(PSTR(" (microseconds step pulse)\r\n"));
00120 
00121   printPgmString(PSTR("$5 = "));
00122   printFloat(settings.default_feed_rate);
00123   printPgmString(PSTR(" (mm/min default feed rate)\r\n"));
00124 
00125   printPgmString(PSTR("$6 = "));
00126   printFloat(settings.default_seek_rate);
00127   printPgmString(PSTR(" (mm/min default seek rate)\r\n"));
00128 
00129   printPgmString(PSTR("$7 = "));
00130   printFloat(settings.mm_per_arc_segment);
00131   printPgmString(PSTR(" (mm/arc segment)\r\n"));
00132 
00133   printPgmString(PSTR("$8 = "));
00134   printInteger(settings.invert_mask_stepdir);
00135   printPgmString(PSTR(" (step port invert mask. binary = "));
00136   print_uint8_base2(settings.invert_mask_stepdir);
00137   printPgmString(PSTR(")\r\n"));
00138 
00139   printPgmString(PSTR("$9 = "));
00140   printInteger(settings.invert_mask_limit);
00141   printPgmString(PSTR(" (step port invert mask limit. binary = "));
00142   print_uint8_base2(settings.invert_mask_limit);
00143   printPgmString(PSTR(")\r\n"));
00144 
00145   printPgmString(PSTR("$10 = "));
00146   printFloat(settings.acceleration/(60*60));
00147   printPgmString(PSTR(" (acceleration in mm/sec^2)\r\n"));
00148 
00149   printPgmString(PSTR("$11 = "));
00150   printFloat(settings.junction_deviation);
00151   printPgmString(PSTR(" (cornering junction deviation in mm)\r\n"));
00152 
00153   printPgmString(PSTR("$12 = "));
00154   printInteger(settings.spindle_pwm);
00155   printPgmString(PSTR(" (PWM on Spindle: 0 = disabled, 1 = enabled)\r\n"));
00156 
00157   printPgmString(PSTR("$13 = "));
00158   printFloat(settings.default_spindle);
00159   printPgmString(PSTR(" (default spindle speed in RPM)\r\n"));
00160 
00161   printPgmString(PSTR("$14 = "));
00162   printFloat(settings.max_spindle);
00163   printPgmString(PSTR(" (maximum spindle speed in RPM)\r\n"));
00164 
00165   printPgmString(PSTR("$1000 = "));
00166   printInteger(st_is_enabled());
00167   printPgmString(PSTR(" (steppers: 0 = disabled, 1 = enabled)\r\n"));
00168 
00169   printPgmString(PSTR("\r\n'$x=value' to set parameter or just '$' to dump current settings\r\n"));
00170 }
00171 
00172 // Parameter lines are on the form '$4=374.3' or '$' to dump current settings
00173 uint8_t settings_execute_line(char *line) {
00174   uint8_t char_counter = 1;
00175   double parameter, value;
00176   if(line[0] != '$') {
00177     return(STATUS_UNSUPPORTED_STATEMENT);
00178   }
00179   if(line[char_counter] == 0) {
00180     settings_dump(); return(STATUS_OK);
00181   }
00182   if(!read_double(line, &char_counter, &parameter)) {
00183     return(STATUS_BAD_NUMBER_FORMAT);
00184   };
00185   if(line[char_counter++] != '=') {
00186     return(STATUS_UNSUPPORTED_STATEMENT);
00187   }
00188   if(!read_double(line, &char_counter, &value)) {
00189     return(STATUS_BAD_NUMBER_FORMAT);
00190   }
00191   if(line[char_counter] != 0) {
00192     return(STATUS_UNSUPPORTED_STATEMENT);
00193   }
00194   settings_store_setting(parameter, value);
00195   return(STATUS_OK);
00196 }
00197 
00198 void write_settings() {
00199   eeprom_put_char(0, SETTINGS_VERSION);
00200   memcpy_to_eeprom_with_checksum(1, (char*)&settings, sizeof(settings_t));
00201 }
00202 
00203 int read_settings() {
00204   // Check version-byte of eeprom
00205   uint8_t version = eeprom_get_char(0);
00206 
00207   if (version == SETTINGS_VERSION) {
00208     // Read settings-record and check checksum
00209     if (!(memcpy_from_eeprom_with_checksum((char*)&settings, 1, sizeof(settings_t)))) {
00210       return(false);
00211     }
00212   }
00213   else
00214   if (version == 1) {
00215     // Migrate from settings version 1
00216     if (!(memcpy_from_eeprom_with_checksum((char*)&settings, 1, sizeof(settings_v1_t)))) {
00217       return(false);
00218     }
00219     settings.acceleration = DEFAULT_ACCELERATION;
00220     settings.junction_deviation = DEFAULT_JUNCTION_DEVIATION;
00221 //     settings.auto_start = DEFAULT_AUTO_START;
00222     write_settings();
00223   }
00224   else
00225   if ((version == 2) || (version == 3)) {
00226     // Migrate from settings version 2 and 3
00227     if (!(memcpy_from_eeprom_with_checksum((char*)&settings, 1, sizeof(settings_t)))) {
00228       return(false);
00229     }
00230     if (version == 2) {
00231         settings.junction_deviation = DEFAULT_JUNCTION_DEVIATION;
00232     }
00233     settings.acceleration *= 3600; // Convert to mm/min^2 from mm/sec^2
00234 //     settings.auto_start = DEFAULT_AUTO_START;
00235     write_settings();
00236   }
00237   else
00238   if (version == 4) {
00239      // Migrate from settings version 4
00240      if (!(memcpy_from_eeprom_with_checksum((char*)&settings, 1, sizeof(settings_t)))) {
00241        return(false);
00242      }
00243      //settings.auto_start = DEFAULT_AUTO_START;
00244      settings.spindle_pwm = SPINDLE_PWM;
00245      settings.default_spindle = DEFAULT_SPINDLE_SPEED;
00246      settings.max_spindle = MAX_SPINDLE_SPEED;
00247      write_settings();
00248   }
00249   else
00250     return false;
00251 
00252   return true;
00253 }
00254 
00255 // A helper method to set settings from command line
00256 void settings_store_setting(int parameter, double value) {
00257   switch(parameter) {
00258  case 0: case 1: case 2:   // X, Y, Z
00259         if (value <= 0.0) {
00260           printPgmString(PSTR("Steps/mm must be > 0.0\r\n"));
00261           return;
00262         }
00263         settings.steps_per_mm[parameter] = value;
00264         break;
00265     case 3 :   // axe T : linear -> U or V or W,  rotary -> A or B or C
00266   if (value <= 0.0) {
00267  #if AXIS_T_TYPE == LINEAR
00268    printPgmString(PSTR("Steps/mm must be > 0.0\r\n"));
00269     #else
00270    printPgmString(PSTR("Steps/degree must be > 0.0\r\n"));
00271     #endif
00272           return;
00273         }
00274     #if AXIS_T_TYPE == LINEAR
00275         settings.steps_per_mm[parameter] = value;
00276     #else
00277   settings.steps_per_degree[parameter] = value;
00278     #endif
00279 
00280   break;
00281     case 4:
00282         if (value < 3) {
00283             printPgmString(PSTR("Step pulse must be >= 3 microseconds\r\n"));
00284             return;
00285         }
00286         settings.pulse_microseconds = round(value);
00287         break;
00288     case 5:
00289         settings.default_feed_rate = value;
00290         break;
00291     case 6:
00292         settings.default_seek_rate = value;
00293         break;
00294     case 7:
00295         settings.mm_per_arc_segment = value;
00296         break;
00297     case 8:
00298         settings.invert_mask_stepdir = trunc(value);
00299         break;
00300     case 9:
00301         settings.invert_mask_limit = trunc(value);
00302         break;
00303     case 10:
00304         settings.acceleration = value*60*60;
00305         break; // Convert to mm/min^2 for grbl internal use.
00306     case 11:
00307         settings.junction_deviation = fabs(value);
00308         break;
00309     case 12:
00310         settings.spindle_pwm = value;
00311         break;
00312     case 13:
00313         settings.default_spindle = value;
00314         break;
00315     case 14:
00316         settings.max_spindle = value;
00317         break;
00318     case 1000:
00319      value ? st_enable(): st_disable();
00320      if (!value) {
00321       coolant_stop();
00322       spindle_stop();
00323      }
00324      return;
00325         break;
00326     default:
00327       printPgmString(PSTR("Unknown parameter\r\n"));
00328       return;
00329   }
00330   write_settings();
00331   printPgmString(PSTR("Stored new setting\r\n"));
00332 }
00333 
00334 // Initialize the config subsystem
00335 void settings_init() {
00336   if(!read_settings()) {
00337     printPgmString(PSTR("Warning: Failed to read EEPROM settings. Using defaults.\r\n"));
00338     settings_reset();
00339     write_settings();
00340     settings_dump();
00341   }
00342 }
